bibl.title: A Lexicon of Greek Personal Names. Volume VB. Coastal Asia Minor: Caria to Cilicia. Editors: Jean-Sébastien Balzat, Richard W.V. Catling, Édouard Chiricat & Fabienne Marchand, Associate Editor: Thomas Corsten.
bibl.seg: Peter Marshall Fraser & Elaine Matthews (edd.), with the collaboration of many scholars, A Lexicon of Greek Personal Names. Volume VB. Coastal Asia Minor: Caria to Cilicia. Editors: Jean-Sébastien Balzat, Richard W.V. Catling, Édouard Chiricat & Fabienne Marchand, Associate Editor: Thomas Corsten.
Oxford, Clarendon Press, 2013, 4°, lviii-471 pp. ISBN 978-0-19-870582-6. £125.
